reviewText: I had the privilege of meeting Steve Domitrovich, hearing the story from him was an amazing experience, he is a true to life hero and along with the othe two survivors and the 84 who died deserve to have their story told.

Great segment!  I was stationed Germany last year and did the "Footsteps of the Battle of the Bulge Tour".  We got to go to Malmedy, and the video portrays all the sights and gives you more historical data as you can see actual footage.  I recommend it!
